text:
I've just been doing some debugging of a perl cgi script. In doing so I was 
outputting a large amount of information to STDERR. During this I found that 
this would hang the apache handler process. Reducing the output or sending it 
to stdout is a workaround. But this could be potienitaly used as a DoS against 
a win32 based apache server if an error case can be found that producing such 
output.
creator: killing@barrysworld.com
